migrations.name: update-cy-mount-usage

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v11. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on v10. https://www.cypress.io/blog/2022/11/04/upcoming-changes-to-component-testing/
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-11

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v12. Cypress 12 contains a handful of breaking changes that might causes tests to start failing that nx cannot directly fix. Read more Cypress 12 changes: https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-12-0.This migration will only run if you are already using Cypress v11.
migrations.name: update-to-cypress-12
